sjchunobfuscate@dau.ac.kr

I have joined the Department of Computer Engineering and Artificial Intelligence at the Dong-A University since Mar. 2021. Before joining Dong-A university, I worked as a guest researcher in the Software and Systems Division in the Information Technology Laboratory at National Institute of Standards and Technology(NIST) from Oct. 2018 to Aug. 2020. I received PhD in Computer Science from Yonsei University in 2018 (advisor: Kyong-Ho Lee).
